clusters.neutral_headline: John Anderson Reflects on the End of Liberal Order

items.title: The liberal global order that has defined our age is coming to an end
items.standfirst: In his 2025 Boyer Lecture, former deputy prime minister John Anderson reflects on democracy and the end of the liberal global order.
items.content: In his 2025 Boyer Lecture, former deputy prime minister John Anderson reflects on democracy and the end of the liberal global order.

ai_summary: John Anderson delivered the 2025 Boyer Lecture.
He reflected on democracy and the liberal global order.
The lecture discusses the end of the current order.
Anderson is a former deputy prime minister.
The lecture explores the changing global landscape.
